name: Spice Quest
description:
Become a Portuguese Merchant and strive to complete the achievements to accumulate wealth and fame to be remembered by further generations.

Find and Trade resources.
Meet kings and try to get away not losing your head.
Learn the history of different countries.
Explore the unknown at your own risk!



The Game was made in the scope of Game Design and Methodologies class in IST, Portugal.
